body: Is anyone else seeing this? When I try a direct link to the [Spack logo](https://cdn.rawgit.com/spack/spack/features/svg-logo/share/spack/logo/spack-logo.svg) and [Slack badge](https://spackpm.herokuapp.com/badge.svg) neither work (404 and Application Error).
title: Spack logo and Slack badge broken in README
